person.persName: Joseph Easley, Jr. (Shelby County, Kentucky, prosecution witness)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, wagon maker. North Carolina native. Married to Elizabeth McWilliams Gaines Easley in Anderson County, Kentucky, on July 17, 1836. Father of Hamilton Easley, John P. Easley, Judith Easley, Mary Easley, William N. Easley, Julie Easley, Carroll Easley, Emily Easley, Merrell Easley, Daniel Easley, Woodson P. Easley, Lucy Easley, Elizabeth P. Easley, and America Easley. Wagon maker in Shelby County in 1850. Stonemason in Shelby County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Shelby County in 1860.
